column1: # Point Zero One Digital - Captions Template for HOS Moment Types and Hook-Story-Lesson Format
This document outlines the ready-to-fill caption hooks by HOS (Human-Operated System) moment type (A01–E01)
column2: along with 10 new hooks for the hook-story-lesson format. The captions are designed to provide clear
column5: adhering to Point Zero One Digital's anti-bureaucratic principles.

column1: 1. Strict TypeScript usage: Never use 'any'. All code is strict-mode.
2. Deterministic effects: All game events and system behaviors are predictable and reproducible.

column2: deployment-ready: The captions are designed for seamless integration into the game's infrastructure.

column3: and execution-focused language in all captions.
